meanings.definition: A slow cooker that is used for cooking food at a low temperature for a long period of time.
meanings.sent1: Mom cooked a delicious stew in the crockpot for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The crockpot simmered the soup all day, making it flavorful.
meanings.sent3: The crockpot and the oven had a race to see who could cook the best meal.
meanings.sent4: Her love for cooking was evident in the way she tended to the crockpot.
meanings.sent5: The aroma wafting from the crockpot filled the house with warmth and anticipation.

meanings.definition: To cook food in a crockpot.
meanings.sent1: I will crockpot the chili for the potluck tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She crockpots meals on busy weekdays to save time.
meanings.sent3: He tried to crockpot a cake, but it didn't turn out well.
meanings.sent4: Crockpotting the roast allowed the flavors to meld perfectly.
meanings.sent5: Crockpotting the ingredients slowly infuses the dish with rich taste.
